constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 104 (Tuesday, June 15, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. SMITH of Nebraska:
H.R. 3889.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Clause 1 of section 8 of article I of the Constitution, to
`provide for the common defense and general welfare of the
United States.'
[Page H2817]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Social Security.

title: Providing Choice for Social Security Retirees Act
